TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapServerProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.ServerProtocol

summary.span: .NET Framework 會建立 類別的執行個體，以處理 XML Web Service 要求。

span.span: The .NET Framework creates an instance of the class to process XML Web service requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫方法來處理 XML Web 服務要求且未明確宣告由使用者透過其 XML Web service 中的方法標示為`WebMethodAttribute`。You can override the method to process XML Web service requests that are not explicitly declared and handled by users through a method in their XML Web service marked with `WebMethodAttribute`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫方法來處理 XML Web 服務要求且未明確宣告由使用者透過其 XML Web service 中的方法標示為`WebMethodAttribute`。You can override the method to process XML Web service requests that are not explicitly declared and handled by users through a method in their XML Web service marked with `WebMethodAttribute`.
